subject: Adobe Suite 3 $269.90
body:
He who sleeps in continual noise is wakened by silence.

There would be no society if living together depended upon understanding each other.

What we are doing at the moment is more that just one thing added to the rest it is a memoir.

He would stab his best friend for the sake of writing an epigram on his tombstone.

I once spent a year in Philadelphia, I think it was on a Sunday.

''Healing,'' Papa would tell me, ''is not a science, but the intuitive art of wooing nature.''

The pleasure we feel in criticizing robs us from being moved by very beautiful things.

An institution is the lengthened shadow of one man.

Some books makes me want to go adventuring, others make me feel that they have saved me the trouble.

A coward is a hero with a wife, kids, and a mortgage.

Character is power it makes friends, draws patronage and support and opens the way to wealth, honor and happiness.

Effective action is always unjust.

A cruel story runs on wheels, and every hand oils the wheels as they run.
